did.unittitle: Maurice Neufeld "The Future of the American Labor Movement" Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: Audio recording of lecture by Maurice Neufeld, given on April 10, 1953.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Professor Maurice Frank Neufeld (October 27, 1910 - April 10, 2003) was an American academic, author, union organizer and Army officer. In 1945, he was one of the two founding faculty members of the School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University, appointed by its founding dean, Irving Ives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Audio recording of lecture by Maurice Neufeld, given on April 10, 1953.
